headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Condemned
content: There’s a dead man walking in Los Santos, and it could easily be you. One player starts this Halloween adversary mode as the condemned, and that puts them on a clock: when the timer runs out, they’re worm food. Their only hope is to pass the bad news onto somebody else, and the only way to do that is sending them on a short trip to a shallow grave. Last man standing wins.
